website_summaries.verdict: A serum that works on decreasing fine lines. This serum is standard in its execution.
pros: A mixture of collagen and hyaluronic acid helps to decrease the appearance of  fine lines and wrinkles while  tightening skin
Aloe vera reduces redness and skin irritation
cons: Some users were disappointed by the lack of plumping effect

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. This is my sixth bottle. I have used many high end serums costing many times higher in price and have never in my using skin care products fifty years now find this product does what it says. I I used to spend hundreds on skin care and now your serum and avocado oil over serum. I am amazed with the outcome of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: shirley e.

customer_reviews.title: Smoother skin but my fine lines are no different.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see much of a difference after using this for five weeks. I will say that it made my skin very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and works on the first application! I am 55 and starting to see loss of firmness and starting to develop jowls. This lifted on the 1st application. I will use DAILY forever
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this day and night for almost three weeks, with the night cream. I see a noticeable difference. I don't look so tired, my completion looks refreshed. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Just because it didn't on me doesn't mean it won't work for you but I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BearSpirit

customer_reviews.title: It feels rich & smooth at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I used for the longest time Lancôme genefique serum which was/is great, but costly. I found this product randomly while shopping in Ross. The shape of the bottle intrigued me because its exactly like the Lancôme one but green. & I gave it a try & I am loving it for it makes my skin more plump!
customer_reviews.author: Soraya

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Use every other day. Not a bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: SassyMoonGlow

customer_reviews.title: BOOOOO!! Nope!
customer_reviews.text: This product was pretty terrible. It left a film that rolled up and flaked off and looked/felt like some snake scale disease. Gross! And the pump applicator was pretty terrible too. Weak, and barely delivered any product. There are much better products out there....don't waste your money here.
customer_reviews.author: AntiSocial Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt help wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This made my skin feel nice for about a week. Several weeks in and the improvement in texture has diminished. I see no improvement in the wrinkle department.
customer_reviews.author: shan

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product just what I've been looking for. Serum collagen is better than just the cream. I noticed the difference in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lexxi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market! Improves fine lines & wrinkles and overall appearance of the skin. Works great for recent scares too! Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use for fine lines around my eyes and and mouth Works great! I just reordered and will continue to use. I recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The bottle container is very weird I wish it was an eyedropper instead. I saw no results from this project either.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for this price point!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt say this is a miracle product, but the results definitely matched the price point and I am happy. It does plump the face slightly and when I did a side by side comparison my husband did notice one side was more " awake" than the other. Results last a few hours in my experience
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: A must-have and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Works great and I can actually see a difference in my skin. Been using for about 2 weeks now and my skin feels rejuvenated.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Voss

customer_reviews.title: makes me break out
customer_reviews.text: this feels nice when using but I have not seen a change i actually break out really bad after using..
customer_reviews.author: Bleh

customer_reviews.title: Generous size, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I received my ProGenix Collagen Serum very quickly and I am very pleased with it. It has a silky texture and blends well with the rest of my complexion regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ricker

customer_reviews.title: This collagen cream is marvelous
customer_reviews.text: I put his under my eyes a couple times a day. I love this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PA Girl!

customer_reviews.title: Only been using the product 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: haven't seen any difference yet...but have only been using it for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah walker

customer_reviews.title: Price and results.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for money. Have used for several months has real helped with wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Mendoza                               nd

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love how quickly it plumps up. Last a few houra i wish it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dougnelson937

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Wouldn't bother to buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. It's ok, I guess. The pipette doesn't draw the serum up so you have to tip it onto your palm. Ni biggie. The serum is pretty light, non-greasy but I haven't noticed any really moisturising/plumping properties over and above a normal, cheap moisturizer. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only used it for a few days so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it for a few days so I can’t really tell you whether I would order again or not I just haven’t had the time to see the results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This actually works! I cannot believe it! I never leave reviews but I ordered this after reading the reviews & looking at the price I thought why not? I am 47 & my skin is holding up pretty well I have taken really good care of it since my early 20's but just recently I started getting a turkey neck much to my dismay :( Nothing was helping so I tried this and not only did it plump up the skin on my face but it made a difference on the old turkey neck already & I have only used it a week so far! I am a believer!
customer_reviews.author: Diane K. Bircher

customer_reviews.title: Ladies', a Must try product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite serum yet! I'm 61 & my skin looks, & feels beter, than when I was in my 40's!! Try IT, Ladies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: ... this was the same thing so I really do recommend it since I do try everything in the line ...
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to a Lancome products very pricey I thought this was the same thing so I really do recommend it since I do try everything in the line of high-end cosmetic and such
customer_reviews.author: Karen Abbruzzio

customer_reviews.title: I'm Stuck On This One..
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't disappointed with ProGenix. This product actually works on me. The difference is very noticeable. I had planned on testing other plumping brands but I'm stuck on this one (third bottle). Very pleased. I like the density of the ingredients and the affordability. ProGenix is one of my ' must have's'
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I get lot's of complement about my skin lately!!!!My skin is glowing and fine lines are minimized!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely we ordered this again
customer_reviews.text: I really love it it's amazing product my skin feels wonderful and my wrinkles seems like there were gone the next day
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET

customer_reviews.title: Good Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Not very effective on wrinkles. Although a good moisturizer, this product is too pricey as it doesn't deliver effective collagen/plumping. My wrinkles are shallow. I expected it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lucr

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: The shipping process was really fast. I love this product. Been a Progenix user for a while now..
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Martino

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just been using for a few days but it appears to work well. I combine it w/vitamin c serum and retinol cream.
customer_reviews.author: mary d murphy

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! My sister gave me this as a Christmas gift and I was not sure if I'd like it. I usually use Regenica night repair. However to my amazement this serum plumps up my skin and gives me that fresh look and softens lines. I usually wash my face at night and then apply it on and when I wake up I look refreshed. Works just as well or even better than the expensive serums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had made a positive noticeable difference to my skin that I love
customer_reviews.text: I just started integrating Collagen products into my beauty routine about 6months ago. I really like this serum a lot. I use during my nightly routine and there is a noticeable difference in my skin that I absolutely love. This serum songs right in brio my skin when I apply it. My face is so much softer, supple, firmer, my lines aren't a noticeable and I just look younger and healthier overall. . I will definitely be repurchasing and highly recommend. I was also impressed with the size of the bottle.... Larger than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Malinda SynnamonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Vegan = cruelty free products
customer_reviews.text: I haven't buy the products via Amazon because I found them way cheaper somewhere else but the results astonished me and my husband. First and main reason to try them is they ARE VEGAN =cruelty free. Given them a try you won't regreat!
customer_reviews.author: Gaia

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only under eye wrinkle serum I’ve actually seen results with. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Diesel250

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: 37 yrs old and so far so good. This product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plumb
customer_reviews.text: Have found that this serum does plump some of the lines around my lips. So far its working need to give it more time
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients. I use this serum on top of many other products in the morning - almost as a topper and it plays nicely with my other products. It feels really good on my dry skin and plumps it up. I would repurchase this item based on the ingredients alone. I am currently trying the ProGenix Retinol. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: been two months, no noticeable results yet, bummer
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this only comes with 1 BOTTLE, NOT TWO LIKE SHOWN IN PICTURE. With that said, this isn't the best collagen serum I've ever used, but it does tighten ND to e pretty well. I did notice that I broke out more at the beginning of using it and I have oily so n, but after two weeks I still didn't notice a difference, but I felt a difference. I love how it feels after the shower and how it makes your face feel all tight. But again, no noticeable results and it's been two months now.
customer_reviews.author: Review-a-Way

product_meta.title: ProGenix Collagen Serum. Instant Plumping Serum with Hyaluronic Acid to plump fine lines. 1oz
product_meta.description: Progenix Collagen Plumping Serum will instantly hydrate and overtime reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. This anti-aging serum with hyaluronic acid and Matrixl 3000 can be applied with other facial oils and moisturizers to complete your skin care routine. Made with aloe vera, vitamin e and Ginseng along with other antioxidants this rejuvenating facial serum is a must have for those looking to restore their youthful looking glow.
feature_bullets: Progenix Professional Skin Care Collagen Serum instantly plumps sagging areas of your skin while noticeably reducing the appearance of expression lines. Hyaluronic Acid firms and tightens your skin.

Anti-aging collagen serum includes Matrixyl 3000 to stimulates Collagen production while repairing dry & aging skin. Vitamin E & Ginseng Extract block free radicals keeping the skin youthful looking. This facial serum can be used with a collagen cream or other anti-aging face moisturizers.
Collagen plumps and locks in moisture for hydrated skin. Aloe Vera reduces redness and skin irritation. Improve the look of fine lines and wrinkles with AcquaCell.

Guaranteed results: The face serum instantly infuses skin with moisture and collagen for a firmer appearance. With daily use skin becomes plush. Within 4 weeks improves the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Paraben free. Safe alternative to injections. Not tested on animals. Made in USA. Satisfaction guaranteed!
